title: World champ Salwa Eid Naser making statements on the track and in fashion
description:
The 400m runner Salwa Eid Naser took a silver medal at the Youth Olympics in 2014 wearing a hijab and a full body suit. Fast forward to her incredible performance at the 2019 World Athletics Championships – she wasn’t wearing a hijab but now has nine tattoos and five piercings.

“I don’t really care what people think. It’s my life and I do what I want.”

LINKS:

Salwa Eid Naser Instagram

Olympic Channel Instagram

Evelyn Watta Twitter

Ed Knowles Twitter

The consequences of the Caster Semenya ruling
